lines: arun dillee shahar ke pahale das raeeson mein gine jaane vaale seth utam prakaash ka sabase chhota beta tha
chaandee ke paalane mein pala
chaandee kee chammach se hee pahalaapahala ann ka daana usake munh mein daala gaya
daadee ka dulaara tha
maan kee aankh ka taara tha
maan thee sab or se ghiree huee
naukarachaakaron kee bheed ka niyannan ghar mein aane vaale har mehamaan kee seva ka dhyaan aur us par paanch bete aur ek betee ka shorashaaraaba
lekin jimmedaaree to kisee na kisee ko baantanee thee bachcho kee dekhabhaal kee
nishchay hua ki kisee padeelikhee aurat ko rakha jae
lekin shart thee ki vah achchhe gharaane kee ho
padeelikhee ho
talaash shuru huee aur jaldee hee kisee ne sujha diya naam chaandanee chauk mein rah rahee raamapyaaree ka
raamapyaaree vidhava ho gaee thee
saath rahatee thee usakee solah varsh kee betee
ek kamare ka ghar
pati jaayadaad ke naam par phootee kaudee bhee chhod kar nahee gaya tha
kaudiyaan khelatekhelate usane sab kuchh kaudee ke daam bech diya tha marane se pahale
maanbetee ko khaane ke laane pade the
aise mein ek khaanadaanee raees parivaar ke beech rahane ka avasar mila
raamapyaaree ko naukaree janch gaee
vaheen rahane kee jagah mil jaegee
betee ke lie bhee surakshit jagah lagee
maanbetee pahunch gaee seth utam prakaash kee havelee mein
seth jee ko to pata bhee nahee tha ki naukaron kee ginatee mein ek nahin do kee badhotaree ho gaee hai
kyonki daadee maan ne jab raamapyaaree ke saath usakee betee chaandanee ko dekha to use usee samay bachchon kee badee deedee ka rutaba de diya
chaandanee to un bachchon ke saamane pareesee dikhatee thee
utam prakaash ke bachcho ne rang aur rup apanee maan se paaya tha jo ki ghoonghat mein rahane ke kaabil hee tha
lekin khaanadaanee parampara khaanadaan ka rutaba hee dekha jaata tha use samay aur aise mein rup rang ke aage doolhe kee nahin chalatee thee
chaandanee kee khoobasooratee ke charche pooree havelee mein the
utam prakaash jo har shaam kaheen kisee rangeen mahaphil mein bita kar raat lautate the is khabar se achhoote na rah sake
bachche chhah ho gae to kya umr to abhee tees paar huee thee asalee javaanee to isee imr mein chadhatee hai
itanee kahaanee sunaee arun ne
chehare par usake napharat ke bhaav aa chuke the
pita se bahut napharat karata tha vah
itana kah chukane ke baad arun ne apane pita utam prakaash ko kutam prakaash kahana shuru kar diya
amit ko yah sambodhan achchha nahee laga
tok diya usane arun ko aisa na kahie aakhir vah aapake pita hai
lekin arun ke man mein to man bhar jahar bhara tha
bola kya kahate ho tum na kahoon kutam ko utam kahoon utam shabd ka apamaan hoga bhaee utam to rakha tha daadee ne apane laadale ka naam
utam hee tha pahale
lekin jab tak raamapyaaree aur chaandanee ye donon randiyaan hamaare ghar nahee aaee thee
in donon ke aane par utam to kutam ban gaya
donon kee donon amit ke munh se nikala
are utam phir bhee utam rah jaata yadi vah sirph raamapyaaree ko apanee eyaashee mein ek aur mohare kee tarah istemaal karata aur masal kar phenk deta aisa to vah roj karata tha
usane raampyaaree ko pahale to bhrasht kiya phir usako jaayadaad ka laalach dekar usakee betee ko usee ke ishaare se apana hamabistar banaaya meree maan se raanee ka khitaab chheen liya

ghar kee tijoree kee chaabiyaan kab daadee maan se chheenakar chaandanee kee sari mein latak gaee kaanon hee kaanon kisee ko khabar na lagee meree maan ke kamare mein jabaradastee apane ek vaphaadaar kute ko bhej diya jab vah kapade badal rahee thee
usane maan ke saath badatameejee karane kee koshish kee to maan ne shor machaaya
par parinaam ulata hua
maan ko hee kulta kaha kutam ne
poore shahar mein badanaam kar diya
daadee isee gam mein chalee gaee aur maan ko ghar chhodana pada
kuchh din to usake bhaeeyon ne sahaara diya aur phir akelee chhod diya kaanoon kee ladaee ladane ko
aise mein vah kya karatee chhoteesee bastee mein kiraaye ka kamara lekar rahatee rahee
arun ke chahare par tanaav tha
dard tha
lekin dard itana adhik tha ki aansoo bhee ghabaraate theaankhon se utar aane ko
par aap log to apane pita ke paas rahe amit ne kaha
haan hamen to yahee kaha gaya tha ki tumhaaree maan kulta thee
bhaag gaee kisee ke saath
bade bhaee ko to phir bhee kuchhakuchh maaloom tha
lekin itana bada to vah bhee nahin tha ki saaree baat samajh sakata
maan se to ham lagabhag chaudah varsh baad mil pae the
vah ghar chhodakar jab gaee thee tab main teen varsh ka tha
jab dubaara milee to main satarah varsh ka
main to chaandanee ko hee apanee maan samajhata tha
mere man mein to maan se pun jaisee bhaavanaen nahin thee
vah to mujhe thodaabahut tab pata laga jab kaalej mein ek din mere hee ek saathee ne mujhe yoon hee baat mein baat nikalate hue sarasaree taur par jikr kar diya mere pita aur maan se sambadhit kes ka
usake pita meree maan ke vakeel the
saaree kahaanee vah mujhe bataata chala gaya jo use apane maataapita ke beech huee baatacheet se maaloom huee thee
haan use yah maaloom nahee tha ki jisakee kahaanee vah suna raha hai unase mera kya sambandh hai
maan ka thodaabahut paksh sunakar main sakate mein aa gaya
raat bhar so na saka
ghar mein tab mera koee bhee bhaee nahee tha
sabhee ke sabhee dillee ke baahar naukaree karate the
sabase bade to phauj mein the
do yahaan amereeka mein aa gae the aur bahan kee bhee shaadee ho gaee thee
aur jinhen main apana chhota bhaee samajhata tha ve do the aur donon ke donon doon skool ke hostal mein rahate the
sab mannamugdh hokar arun kee kahaanee sun rahe the
bilkul philmee kahaanee thee yah
keval veena andarabaahar aa ja rahee thee
usane to na jaane kitanee baar yah kahaanee sunee hogee
ab tak to use rat gaee thee yah
iseelie is kahaanee ko sunane ke lie vah aatur nahin dikhatee thee
arun tha ki jaise chaalees varsh peechhe laut gaya ho
chaay par chaay peee ja raha tha aur bolata ja raha tha raat ko mai hee gha par akela tha
kutam aur chaandanee kaheen paartee mein gae the aur raampyaaree daaru ke teenachaar paig lagaakar apane kamare mein padee thee
koee na koee naukar jarur hota tha usake saath
kutam kee alamaaree mein ja kar mainne kuchh phailon ko tatola
mujhe doteen phaeelen bade kaam kee lagee
unhen uthaakar main apane kamare mein le aaya
raat bhar padhata raha
ek phaeel thee meree maan aur kutam ke kes kee

ek phaeel thee meree daadee ke vaseeyatanaamen kee jisamen vah apanee saaree jaayadaad va baink bailens ham sab bhaeeyon ke naam kar gaee thee aur ek phail mein meree maan ke likhe kuchh pan the jinhen kutam ne sahej rakh chhoda tha
shaayad apane parti mere vishvaas ko todane ke lie raat bhar mai so na saka
kuchh pal ruk kar vah bola dar naam kee cheej mujhe janm se nahee milee thee
lekin yah nidarata iseelie thee kyonki main svayan ko ek kavachadhaaree maanata tha
ameer baap ka beta jo har dam naukaron ke saaye mein ho ek chaukeedaar jisake saath ho aur paison kee ek motee gaddee jisake paas rahatee ho
main yahaan ek baat bata doon chaandanee mujhe pyaar karatee thee mujhe laad karatee thee main jo maangata tha detee thee
ab lagata hai mujhe kamajor banaakar apana gulaam banaakar rakh chhodana chaahatee thee taaki main svayan kuchh na kar sakoon

mai usake hukm ka gulaam rahoon aur usake ishaare par naachata rahoon chaay ka ek lamba ghoont bharakar vah phir bolane laga usee nidarata mein main subah naashte kee tebal par vah teenon phailen lekar pahunch gaya
aaj tak kutam ne mera aisa rup nahee dekha tha
yah kaisee phailen hain baaboojee main kutam ko baaboojee kahata tha
mere haath mein phailen dekhakar kutam ne sahajata se kaha yah tumen kahaan mileen kaam kee cheejen hain beta kisee kes se sambandhit hongee
jahaan padee thee vaheen rakh do
lekin ye to hamaare ghar kee phailen hain
chauk pada ekadam kutam uthakar aage badhakar ekadam mere haath se lekar jaldeejaldee panne palatane laga
yah to meree alamaaree mein padee theen kisane nikaalee rosh tha usakee aavaaj mein
mainne nikaalee aur saaree padh leen
main raat bhar nahin so saka
mujhe to pata nahin tha jise main maan samajhata hoon vah randee hai usakee maan randee hai aur meree maan kaheen bheekh maang rahee hogee
nyaay kee bheekh shaayad usake aage main kuchh na bol paaya
kutam ne donon haathon se mere chehare par tadaatad thappad maarane shuru kar diye
bas phir kya tha meree aankhon se parda uth gaya
vah chaadannee mere lie daayan ban gaee
vahee jo mujhe dulaar karatee thee
mujhe gandee naalee ka keeda kahane lagee
kutam ka khoon tha main lekin usane kabhee roka nahin use aur aakhir ek din main aspataal ja pahuncha
mere doodh mein shaayad kuchh mila diya tha kisee naukar ne
lekin mujhe bachana tha main bach gaya
meree maan ko maaloom pada vah aspataal aaee
mere paas ghanton baithee rahatee aur meree seva karatee rahatee
saaree kahaanee spasht ho gaee mujhe
main usake baad kabhee bhee kutam se nahee mila
haan usake har janmadin par use ek patr jarur likhata hoon
khoob gaaliya likhata hoon
man kee har bhadaas nikaalata hoon aur kutam mujhe kabhee javaab nahee deta
maan ne mujhe kanaada bhijavaaya taaki phir koee mujhe na maar sake
mere sab bhaeeyon ko mainne saaree sachchaee se avagat karaaya
lekin koee bhee apane baap ke khilaaph jaane ko taiyaar nahee tha
haan ab sabhee rote hai kyonki kutam ne daadee kee saaree jaayadaad bhee apane naam karava kar bech dee

daadee ka vaseeyatanaama kaise naya ban gaya jisamen hamen aur hamaaree maan ko hee haraamee karaar kar diya gaya aise mein bolo main kaise kutam ko uttam kahoon kaise main usase yuddh na karun arun ne apanee kahaanee pooree kee
kamaal hai jeejaajee
aap utam ko kutam kahen ya aur bhee kuchh lekin yahaan baithakar use gaalee nikaal kar usase yuddh ke lie aatur aap kuchh bhee nahin kar sakate
yuddh karana hai to chalie indiya
amit ne sahaanubhooti bhare shabdon se kaha
indiya main aaunga jarur aaunga har baar tum logon se kahata hoon kisee vakeel se baat karo use mera kes batao
jo meree maan ka vakeel tha usase milo
na jaane kitanee baar prem se bola mai
har baar yahee kaha agalee chhuttee par jarur pata lagaunga
ab tumhen phir bata raha hoon
pata lagaakar bataana
main turant aa jaunga
arun ne apanee baat amit par daal dee
use maaloom tha ki vah nahee aaega kabhee
hamesha se vah kabhee use kabhee prem se kaanoon kee ladaee kee baat karata hai lekin us ladaee ko ladane ka dam nahee usamen
bola amit pata laga kar kya hoga aap ka kes bahut saral hai dikhane mein
lekin hai bahut pecheeda
paitrak sampati ka kes hai jise aapaka baap apanee doosaree patnee kee aulaad ko diye ja raha hai
usake lie aapako saare saboot jutaane hogen
sabase milana hoga aur us par intajaar karana hoga aapako
teesachaalees saal se aap chhatapata rahe hain
aur ab aapako sudh aaee hai jab aap saath varsh ke ho chale hain
kabhee socha hai aapane ki aapake pita kee umr ab kitanee hogee nabbe saal se upar vah hai bhee ya nahee itana bhee aapako nahee maaloom
aur hogen bhee to poore nishkriy
ab tak kya bacha hoga aapake poorvajon ka unake paas sochie jara jo chaandanee ke bachche hai unakee umr bhee paintaaleesapachaas ke lagabhag hogee
itanee chaalaak aurat ne kya chhoda hoga aapaka puraana kuchh sab badal liya hoga
aap yahaan paradesh mein been baja rahe hai apane khaanadaan kee apanee riyaasat kee aur vahaan us ped kee ek bhee tahanee bachee nahin hogee
amit kee aavaaj mein rosh tha ab kis ka rona hain
main vakeel nahee hoon
par phir bhee kah sakata hoon ki yah gutthee nahin rahee
us gutthee kee kabr maatr hai jisaka aap rona rote hai
ab kaahe ka rona ab kaahe ka tarasana yah aapake janm mein to nahee ho sakata yadi kuchh saboot hon bhee to aapake paas
bas phir kya tha arun yah sunakar sann ho gaya
priya bhee chup ho gaee aur veena kee aankhon mein aansoo bhar aae
amit ne aaj aaj pahalee baar kisee ne arun ke beete kal ko jhakajhor diya hai
arun ko kisee ne neend se jagaaya hai
arun jo kal mein beete kal mein jeeta tha ekaek utha aur bheetar chal gaya
amit se kya veena se kya shaam ghar laute bachchon se bhee nahin bola
teesara din sabhee ka bahut bhaaree tha
jo kal hua use agale subah kisee ne bhee nahee doharaaya
arun ke chehare par chuppee thee
veena bilkul naarmal thee
amit va priya bhee arun ko chup dekhakar chupachaap chor najaron se arun ke chehare ke bhaavon ko padhane kee cheshta kar rahe the
naashte kee mej par bhee koee baat nahee huee
aise shaant vaataavaran ka amit aadee nahee tha
chuppee usee ne todee
lagata hai jeejaajee meree baaten aapako bahut buree lagee
buree lagee aisee dhaarana kyon bana lee tumane ho sakata hai tumhaaree baat ne mujhe kuchh sochane par vivash kar diya ho tumhaare aakhir ke shabd mere kaanon mein abhee tak ganjoo rahe hai
vaastav mein bahut samay beet gaya hai
lekin kahate hai himmat nahin haaranee chaahie
aur kya kahate hain der aae durust aae
aaj bhee mujhe yah muhaavara yaad hai
kya ek koshish bhee nahin kee ja sakatee
arun dil par se bojh utarata mahasoos hua amit ko
shabdon ko saavadhaanee se chunachun kar vah bola kyon nahin kee ja sakatee koshish aap ek kaam keejie apane kes se sambadhit jo kuchh bhee kaagaj aapake paas hai vah mujhe de deejie
abhee ham do din aur hai yahaan
aaraam se baith kar apane kes ke lie jo bhee jaruree tathy hai unhen silasilevaar likh deejie
mai dillee jaakar apane kisee vakeel mitr se salaah karunga
itanee jaldee to kuchh nahin likhakar de sakata
haan aisa karate hai main jitanee jaldee ho sakega tumhen sab likhakar bhej doonga
eemel kar doonga
aur jo kuchh kaagajaat mere paas hai ya kuchh chitthiyaan amerika mein mere do bhaeeyon ke paas hai ve bhee main unase mangavaakar tumhen bhijava doonga
haan indiya mein tumhe mere shesh do bhaeeyon se milakar baat karanee hogee
amit kee baat sunakar arun phir se utsaahit ho chala tha
amit ne saavadhaanee se utar diya dekhie jeejaajee abhee pahala kadam to uthaeee
jab vakeel se baat hogee tab pahale aapako aana hoga aur usake baad agar jarurat hogee to aapake bhaeeyon se mil lenge
abhee aap kes sambandhit sabhee kaagajaat taiyaar keejie
amit kee baat sunakar arun ekaek khush ho gaya
umr saath ho chalee thee balki usase bhee ekaadh varsh jyaada aur bhaavanaen bilkul bachchon kee tarah theen
sapanon kee duniyaan mein raha hai na vah sadaiv sapane lene hee use achchhe lagate rahe hai
tabhee to hamesha uncheeunchee aage kee baaten karata hai
kes jeet gaya to jaayadaad bech kar deharaadoon mein ek estet loonga
chaay ka baag loonga
vah to amit ne vaheen use rok diya tha ki chaay ke baag ab deharaadoon mein nahin rahe varana to vah amit ko chaay ke baag ko sambhaalane ke lie mainejar bhee dhoondhane ko kah deta
is chhoteesee baat se ek phaayada ho gaya
ghar ka vaataavaran naarmal ho gaya
aur arun svayan hee amit ka agale do dinon ka prograam banaane mein vyast ho gaya
chalo aisa karate hain
tumhen bhee achchha lagega
ham badee vain kiraaye par lete hai
tumhen vaapisee mein toronto hote hue niyaagra phaals tak jaana hai aur vahaan se tum yu es baardar paar karake bas lekar nyooyaark jaoge
ham sabhee niyaagra phaals tak tumhaare saath chalenge
isee bahaane hamaare bachchon kee bhee aauting ho jaegee
abhee tak unhonne bhee niyaagra phaals nahin dekha
ek raat ham sabhee toronto rukakar saara shahar bhee ghoom sakate hain
yah kya arun ne to ekadam badhiya prograam bana diya
kahaan to vah nau logon ko dinar karavaane mein katara raha tha aur kahaan vah aath sau meel ka saphar tay kar sabake saath pooree mastee lena chaahata tha
aaj man se bahut prasann hain aap lagata hai veena ne kaha
vah to khush ho gaee thee
priya ke do din adhik saath ka sunakar
haan mujhe laga koee apana hai ab indiya mein aur aage badhakar usane amit ko gale laga liya
vaataavaran bhaavuk ho gaya
sabakee aankhon me aansoo aa gae
agala din bahut khushee se beeta
aur usase aage ke do din to pooree mastee mein beete
pahale sabhee toronto ghoome
phir vahaan se niyaagra phaals
khoobasooratee hee thee chaaron or
itana khoobasoorat shahar itana khoobasoorat saphar kabhee nahee karane ko mila tha
lubhaavane drashy sundar meelon lambee sadaken neele paanee kee jheele shahar mein gaganachubee imaarate aur niyaagra phaals ka drashy jaise svarg lok kee kalpanaasa prateet ho raha tha
aur us par arun va veena ka saath
bachchon ko bachcho ka saath
do raaten saath beeteen aur aakhir bichhudane ka samay aa gaya
subah nau baje bas ne chalana tha nyooyaark ke lie
ek ghanta pahale sabhee hotal chhod kar aa gae the basastaind par
aansoo the ki tham nahee rahe the
bahanen baarabaar gale lagateen
bachche baarabaar rone lagate
amit va arun chaah kar bhee apane aansoo nahin rok pa rahe the
aakhir nau baj gae
vida hone ke lie bas kee or pahale bachche badhe
kanaada mool ke log vahaan aisa drashy dekhakar bhaav vihaval the
do bahanon kee judaee donon roe ja rahee thee
bachche bhee ro rahe the
aur ekado boodhee aurate bhee jo saath saphar karane vaalee thee apane aansoo na rok paeen
pyaar se veena va priya ko chup karaane lagee thee vah
bas chal padee
aansuon ka pravaah na tham paaya
veena va arun apane bachchon ke saath vaheen rah gae aur priya va amit apane bachchon ke saath bas mein baithakar aage kee or badh gae
na jaane kab milan ho inaka phir
